settings.title: High Stability and Hardness
settings.sub_title: With enhanced stability and hardness, 16K Standard Resin delivers the right balance of strength and rigidity — so your prints not only look accurate but hold up under pressure.

settings.title: Low Odor, Comfortable to Use
settings.sub_title: Formulated with a low-odor recipe, this resin creates a safer, more pleasant printing environment from start to finish.

settings.title: Precision Printing, Consistent Accuracy
settings.sub_title: Designed for excellent dimensional accuracy, this resin features low volume shrinkage for smooth surfaces, sharp details, and reliable precision.

settings.title: Universal Printer Compatibility
settings.description: Whether you're working with the HALOT-X1 or another LCD/DLP 3D printer, this resin integrates seamlessly into your setup. It's also available in multiple colors, making it easy to match your creative vision or production needs.

settings.title: Smooth Flow, Clean Release
settings.description: With optimized fluidity and low viscosity, the resin flows easily into fine details and cures efficiently, improving print success rates and reducing adhesion to the FEP film — for smoother printing and easier model removal.
